title: "Nonparametric Goodness-of-Fit Tests for ISV cell migration to the dorsal longitudinal anastomotic vessel (DLAV)"
author: "Wolfgang Giese"
date: "February 25, 2021"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE) 
library(dgof)
library(ggplot2)
library(rjson)
library(plotrix)
library(plyr)

show_ks_details=TRUE
```

```{r read_migration_distributions, echo=FALSE}
path = getwd()
filename <- paste(path,"../../02_derived_data/mitosis_and_cell_number_data/mitosis_cell_number_distributions.json", sep = "/")
#print(paste("Filename: ",filename))
migration_json <- fromJSON(file = filename)
print(migration_json)
```

## Comparison of cell migration to DLAV, aISV vs vISV for all conditions

```{r plot_migration_distributions_control, echo=FALSE}

res <- dgof::ks.test(migration_json$migration_to_dlav$control$aISV, migration_json$migration_to_dlav$control$vISV)


text <- sprintf("p-value : %s", res$p.value)

vessel_type <- c()
vessel_type[1:length(migration_json$migration_to_dlav$control$aISV)] <- "aISV"
vessel_type[length(migration_json$migration_to_dlav$control$aISV)+1:length(migration_json$migration_to_dlav$control$vISV)] <- "vISV"

df <- data.frame(vessel_type, c(migration_json$migration_to_dlav$control$aISV,migration_json$migration_to_dlav$control$vISV))

colnames(df) <- c("vessel_type","counts")
mu <- ddply(df, "vessel_type", summarise, grp.mean=mean(counts))
sigma <- ddply(df, "vessel_type", summarise, grp.std=sd(counts))
mu_sigma_aISV <- paste(mu$vessel_type[1],"mean :" ,mu$grp.mean[1], "sd :", sigma$grp.std[1], sep =" ")
mu_sigma_vISV <- paste(mu$vessel_type[2],"mean :" ,mu$grp.mean[2], "sd :", sigma$grp.std[2], sep =" ")

p <-  ggplot(df, aes(x=counts, fill=vessel_type, color=vessel_type) ) + 
      geom_histogram(position="dodge", binwidth=1.0) +
      geom_vline(data=mu, aes(xintercept=grp.mean, color=vessel_type),
      linetype="dashed") #+
      #theme(axis.line = element_line(),
      #      panel.background = element_blank())

p + labs(title = "Comparison control aISV vs. vISV",
              subtitle = "Cell migration count per ISV",
              caption =  sprintf("p-value : %s \n %s \n %s", res$p.value, mu_sigma_aISV, mu_sigma_vISV) )  + 
    ylab("ISV count") + 
    xlim(0,max(df$counts))+
    scale_x_discrete(name ="Cells migrated to DLAV per ISV", 
    limits=0:max(df$counts) )+
    scale_color_manual(values=c("red","blue","#999999")) +
    scale_fill_manual(values=c("#FFDACC", "#CCF2F2", "#999999"))

if (show_ks_details){
  print("results of discrete KS-test:")
  print(res)
}
#print(paste("vessel type", mu$vessel_type[1],"mean :" ,mu$grp.mean[1], "sd :", sigma$grp.std[1], sep =" "))
#print(paste("vessel type", mu$vessel_type[2],"mean :" ,mu$grp.mean[2], "sd :", sigma$grp.std[2], sep =" "))
#print(paste("Standard deviation for ", sigma$vessel_type[1],":" , sigma$grp.std[1],sep =" "))
#print(paste("Mean for ", mu$vessel_type[2],":" ,mu$grp.mean[2],sep =" "))
#print(paste("Standard deviation for ", sigma$vessel_type[2],":" , sigma$grp.std[2],sep =" "))
```

```{r plot_migration_distributions_Wasp, echo=FALSE}

res <- dgof::ks.test(migration_json$migration_to_dlav$`WaspI [100uM]`$aISV, migration_json$migration_to_dlav$`WaspI [100uM]`$vISV)


text <- sprintf("p-value : %s", res$p.value)

vessel_type <- c()
vessel_type[1:length(migration_json$migration_to_dlav$`WaspI [100uM]`$aISV)] <- "aISV"
vessel_type[length(migration_json$migration_to_dlav$`WaspI [100uM]`$aISV)+1:length(migration_json$migration_to_dlav$`WaspI [100uM]`$vISV)] <- "vISV"

df <- data.frame(vessel_type, c(migration_json$migration_to_dlav$`WaspI [100uM]`$aISV,migration_json$migration_to_dlav$`WaspI [100uM]`$vISV))

colnames(df) <- c("vessel_type","counts")
mu <- ddply(df, "vessel_type", summarise, grp.mean=mean(counts))
sigma <- ddply(df, "vessel_type", summarise, grp.std=sd(counts))
mu_sigma_aISV <- paste(mu$vessel_type[1],"mean :" ,mu$grp.mean[1], "sd :", sigma$grp.std[1], sep =" ")
mu_sigma_vISV <- paste(mu$vessel_type[2],"mean :" ,mu$grp.mean[2], "sd :", sigma$grp.std[2], sep =" ")

p <-  ggplot(df, aes(x=counts, fill=vessel_type, color=vessel_type) ) + 
      geom_histogram(position="dodge", binwidth=1.0) +
      geom_vline(data=mu, aes(xintercept=grp.mean, color=vessel_type),
      linetype="dashed")

p + labs(title = "Comparison aISV vs. vISV for WaspI [100uM]",
              subtitle = "Cell migration count per ISV",
              caption =  sprintf("p-value : %s \n %s \n %s", res$p.value, mu_sigma_aISV, mu_sigma_vISV) )  + 
    ylab("ISV count") + 
    xlim(0,max(df$counts))+
    scale_x_discrete(name ="Cells migrated to DLAV per ISV", 
    limits=0:max(df$counts) )+
    scale_color_manual(values=c("red","blue","#999999")) +
    scale_fill_manual(values=c("#FFDACC", "#CCF2F2", "#999999"))

if (show_ks_details){
  print("results of discrete KS-test:")
  print(res)
}
```

## Comparison of cell migration to DLAV between conditions for aISV and vISV

```{r plot_migration_distributions_WASP_vs_Control_aISV, echo=FALSE}

res <- dgof::ks.test(migration_json$migration_to_dlav$control$aISV, migration_json$migration_to_dlav$`WaspI [100uM]`$aISV)


text <- sprintf("p-value : %s", res$p.value)

condition <- c()
condition[1:length(migration_json$migration_to_dlav$control$aISV)] <- "control"
condition[length(migration_json$migration_to_dlav$control$aISV)+1:length(migration_json$migration_to_dlav$`WaspI [100uM]`$aISV)] <- "Wasp"

df <- data.frame(condition, c(migration_json$migration_to_dlav$control$aISV,migration_json$migration_to_dlav$`WaspI [100uM]`$aISV))

colnames(df) <- c("condition","counts")
mu <- ddply(df, "condition", summarise, grp.mean=mean(counts))
sigma <- ddply(df, "condition", summarise, grp.std=sd(counts))
mu_sigma_cond1 <- paste(mu$condition[1],"mean :" ,mu$grp.mean[1], "sd :", sigma$grp.std[1], sep =" ")
mu_sigma_cond2 <- paste(mu$condition[2],"mean :" ,mu$grp.mean[2], "sd :", sigma$grp.std[2], sep =" ")


p <-  ggplot(df, aes(x=counts, fill=condition, color=condition) ) + 
      geom_histogram(position="dodge", binwidth=1.0) +
      geom_vline(data=mu, aes(xintercept=grp.mean, color=condition),
      linetype="dashed")

p + labs(title = "Comparison control vs. WaspI [100uM] for aISVs",
              subtitle = "Cell migration count per ISV",
              caption =  sprintf("p-value : %s \n %s \n %s", res$p.value, mu_sigma_cond1, mu_sigma_cond2))  + 
    ylab("ISV count") + 
    xlim(0,max(df$counts))+
    scale_x_discrete(name ="Cells migrated to DLAV per ISV", 
    limits=0:max(df$counts) )+
    scale_color_manual(values=c("black", "red", "#999999")) +
    scale_fill_manual(values=c("grey", "#FFDACC", "#999999"))

if (show_ks_details){
  print("results of discrete KS-test:")
  print(res)
}
```

```{r plot_migration_distributions_Wasp1_vs_Gata1_Wasp1_aISV, echo=FALSE}
res <- dgof::ks.test(migration_json$migration_to_dlav$`WaspI [100uM]`$aISV, migration_json$migration_to_dlav$Gata1_Wasp1$aISV)


text <- sprintf("p-value : %s", res$p.value)

condition <- c()
condition[1:length(migration_json$migration_to_dlav$`WaspI [100uM]`$aISV)] <- "Wasp1"
condition[length(migration_json$migration_to_dlav$`WaspI [100uM]`$aISV)+1:length(migration_json$migration_to_dlav$Gata1_Wasp1$aISV)] <- "Gata1-Wasp1"

df <- data.frame(condition, c(migration_json$migration_to_dlav$`WaspI [100uM]`$aISV,migration_json$migration_to_dlav$Gata1_Wasp1$aISV))

colnames(df) <- c("condition","counts")
mu <- ddply(df, "condition", summarise, grp.mean=mean(counts))
sigma <- ddply(df, "condition", summarise, grp.std=sd(counts))
mu_sigma_cond1 <- paste(mu$condition[1],"mean :" ,mu$grp.mean[1], "sd :", sigma$grp.std[1], sep =" ")
mu_sigma_cond2 <- paste(mu$condition[2],"mean :" ,mu$grp.mean[2], "sd :", sigma$grp.std[2], sep =" ")


p <-  ggplot(df, aes(x=counts, fill=condition, color=condition) ) + 
      geom_histogram(position="dodge", binwidth=1.0) +
      geom_vline(data=mu, aes(xintercept=grp.mean, color=condition),
      linetype="dashed")

p + labs(title = "Comparison `WaspI [100uM]` vs. Gata1-Wasp1 for aISVs",
              subtitle = "Cell migration count per ISV",
              caption =  sprintf("p-value : %s \n %s \n %s", res$p.value, mu_sigma_cond1, mu_sigma_cond2))  + 
    ylab("ISV count") + 
    xlim(0,max(df$counts))+
    scale_x_discrete(name ="Cells migrated to DLAV per ISV", 
    limits=0:max(df$counts) )+
    scale_color_manual(values=c("black", "red", "#999999")) +
    scale_fill_manual(values=c("grey", "#FFDACC", "#999999"))

if (show_ks_details){
  print("results of discrete KS-test:")
  print(res)
}
```
